name: dr_ratio_annuals
description: DPM/RPM ratio for annual crops and decomposable amendments (e.g. mulch and leaves)

name: dr_ratio_treegrass
description: DPM/RPM ratio for tree litter and grass

name: dr_ratio_wood
description: DPM/RPM ratio for woody inputs (tree prunings wood chips etc.)

name: dr_ratio_fym
description: DPM/RPM ratio for recalcitrant amendments (e.g. farmyard manure and compost)

name: plant_cover_modifier
description: Decomposition rate modifier with plant cover

name: decomp_mod
description: Global decomposition rate scaling modifier (applies to all cases)

name: grass_rsr_b
description: Exponent for MAP-based grassland root:shoot ratio function (negative exponential)

name: residue_frac_remaining
description: Fraction of residues retained under crop residues mostly removed (not grazed)

name: cc_yield_mod
description: Cover crop yield scaling modifier (multiplies AGB and thus BGB via r_s_ratio)
